Reviews.Title: Nice Looking, but thats it!
Reviews.Author: AmandaH
Reviews.Content: Camera is pretty, but that is all. while taking pictures, you and the object your trying to capture have to be completely still, or you will get an extremely blurry picture. not worth my time.

Reviews.Title: Purple camera
Reviews.Author: AlienZ
Reviews.Content: This little puppy isn't as powerful as some cameras and doesn't have a zoom but it takes clear pretty pictures and that's all you really can ask out of a cheaper camera.  You definitely get your money out of it.  Uses 3 aa batteries and they recommend that you don't use rechargeables.  The energizers I put in mine have lasted over a month so the battery use seems to be minimal

Reviews.Title: Very cheap adequate camera
Reviews.Author: James F. Johnson
Reviews.Content: A lot of  reviews I read said this camera took blurry pictures.  I found the pictures sharp enough for a 2mp camera. I had actually bought it hoping it would take distorted, toy-camera, type pictures and was disappointed to find it took normal adequate pictures.  It looks like an outdoor-only camera and might only work indoors if you are by a window on a sunny day.

Reviews.Title: Bad even as a toy for a 5 year old
Reviews.Author: Thomas Schimonsky "tvonschimo"
Reviews.Content: Horrible. The package advertises this camera as being able to take 120 pictures. But when you open the package and read the instructions you find out that you can take 12 pictures if you like to have the "highest resolution" (a joke by itself).The camera does not allow for memory expansion.The camera does not have a flash -- that is, any pictures taken indoors are useless.The door of the compartment that holds the batteries opens easily -- and if it does open, you lose all the pictures you have taken.This item belongs in the dollar store -- sold 2 for $1.

Reviews.Title: great gift idea
Reviews.Author: Carmen Carlson
Reviews.Content: Got for my 10 year old niece and she has the best time with it.  Wish it had more memory

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Dawn M. Anthony
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures I had ordered 2 of them one for me another as a gift there a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Vivtar Vivicam V25 Digital Camera (Grape)
Reviews.Author: Gloria Hoffpauir
Reviews.Content: I chose this camera because my grand daughter wanted a camera and this one appealed to be of good quality--and easy for her to operate and she loved the color (GRAPE!)

Reviews.Title: RECEIVED BROKEN
Reviews.Author: janet l thomas
Reviews.Content: When my daughter opened her camera for christmas we found out that it definately didnt look new!!  Silver on right front top corner was scratched off.  We overlooked it and put batteries in it only to find it didnt work!!!  We had to hold the power button down continuously for it to even stay on and then when we tried to take a picture it wouldnt take it.  Definately not happy.  Sent back immediately for a full refund.

Reviews.Title: I did not like
Reviews.Author: carlos lugo
Reviews.Content: is of very poor quality the image is barely visible and the material is bad not recommend I lost my money

Reviews.Title: vivitar vivicam v 25 digital camera grape and red
Reviews.Author: jason
Reviews.Content: i used it for a day and it quit working i replace battery but nothing.i send it in vivitar.the customer rep was a jerk.i told him i send it in he ask me for the tracking number but i told him i lost it.he said we can do anything unless you have the tracking number..i was mad i wish i did not buy this piece of junk.so i got mad at him and told him off.i said you customer sevice stink.i did raise my voice over the phone..he said the omly way we can see if we got it unless you having the tracking number to see where is it.i know i send it to the right address.i.m sharing with amazion customer what happen to me .i got this a radio store not company own. .i played with it to learn how to use it. .it does not keep you picture in the memory when you remove battery .and no memory card.itswas acting odd sometime you got to keep you finger on power to keep it running thanlet and dead

Reviews.Title: Low Quality and Rendered Broken & Useless within a month
Reviews.Author: Wellshelle
Reviews.Content: This camera is of very low functionality to begin with. I was looking for a simple shoot and click camera my Grandmother could use so she didn't have to keep buying disposables. This was not a good answer. It cannot capture a picture very well and is very delayed. There is no flash and none of the pictures turned out anywhere near clear. Within 1 month after setting it up, it no longer turns on at all--despite battery changes and attempting to connect with the computer. Don't buy this product.
